roleset.name: stock prices

role.descr: end point or end state of arg1

example.text: Cray Research stock jumped $2.875 yesterday to close at $38.

roleset.note: Recall from 'rise' and 'gain' etc that arg2 can also be a MNR, as in"jumped sharply".

example.name: opportunity knocks
example.text: Several new funds have jumped to trade at big premiums.

example.name: metaphorical
example.text: And what we want *PRO* to do *T* is we-3 do n't want *PRO*-3 to just look at the meterial evidence that we have *T* and immediately make a -- um jumpt to a conclusion that this is a certain individual.

roleset.name: to escape, bail out

role.descr: entity escaped from (e.g. bail/trail); or idiomatically 'jump ship'

roleset.note: Most examples in this roleset are pretty idiomatic: "jump ship"means to bail out of something, or literally to leave a sinking ship; "jump bail" means to fail to appear incourt after posting bail. These are all being lumped together in oneroleset. Edited by Miriam.

example.name: jump the gun
example.text: Now all of these statements by the President and others are jumping the gun.
example.arg: all of these statments by the President and others

example.name: jump the shark
example.text: This TV show has jumped the shark so many times that I don't even notice it any more.
example.arg: so many times that I don't even notice it any more

roleset.name: attack, gangsta style

example.name: both args
example.text: `` This deal at Las Putas Buenas where-1 the two knife-men jumped you *T*-1'' , said Rourke with interest , `` that sounds like it was set up with malice aforethought by the luscious Mrs. Peralta , does n't it '' ? ?

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on Brown. No Vncls. No fully matching comparison (although attack is close-- jump doesn't seem to take the arg1 attribute).

predicate.note: Frames file for 'jump' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'increase'

example.name: knock knock
example.text: People are jumping in now to buy the funds.

predicate.note: basically the same as "be excited at an opportunity" roleset

roleset.name: rise

example.name: rise quickly
example.text: He jumped up from his seat.

roleset.note: Jump_up and 'Jump ship' added by Miriam.
